aboutLocales.zh:
关于 CodexFlow

CodexFlow 诞生于一个简单的想法：让 Codex 的使用体验更流畅、更优雅。
aboutLocales.en:
About CodexFlow

CodexFlow began with a simple idea: make interacting with Codex smoother and more elegant.

latest.notes:
1. 实时显示账号剩余用量
2. 支持 @Cursor Rule(仅引用)
3. 代理任务完成时推送系统/图标/声音通知
4. 重构设置页面布局,新增账号信息展示
5. 设置页新增缓存完全清理功能
6. 修复若干已知问题

notesLocales.zh:
1. 实时显示账号剩余用量
2. 支持 @Cursor Rule(仅引用)
3. 代理任务完成时推送系统/图标/声音通知
4. 重构设置页面布局,新增账号信息展示

notesLocales.en:
1. Added real-time display for remaining account usage
2. Added support for @Cursor Rule (reference only)
3. Added system/icon/sound notifications when proxy tasks complete
4. Refactored settings layout with new account info section
5. Added full cache clear option in Settings
6. Fixed several known issues
